ovdesc.p: This file maintains a list of all items spooled by the T24 system (excluding delivery advices, confirmations etc.)
The actual printed output is stored in the &HOLD& or CUSTOMER.HOLD files.
It records the name of the report, the user who requested it, the date and time it was produced and whether or not it was produced as part of a batch run.
Reports can be reprinted or viewed by using the V function. To operate the view facility the following commands are allowed:

F1... Quit F2... Back to the top of the previous page. F3... Forward to the top of the next page. F4... Forward to the last line of the last page. F5... Forward one line. F6... Back one line. F7. Scroll left 20 characters. F8. Scroll right 20 characters. P... Display from top of page ... L... Display at line ... R Reprint current report. S Toggle screen between 132 and 80 width.
All prompts and replies are defined in the static text record REPRINT.VIEW.
